Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: NET 2008 Network structure and complexity (Trento, Italy: speaker)
AMASES 2008 (Trento, Italy: member of the organizing committee)
ICAOR 2010 (Turku, Finland: speaker and member of the International Scientific Programme Committee)
FORS40 Finnish Operational Research Society meeting (Lappeenranta, Finland: speaker)
KES 2014 (Gdynia, Poland: member of the programme committee of the invited session: "Modeling with Qualitative and Quantitative Pairwise Comparisons")
NSAIS 2016 (Lappeenranta, Finland: participant and member of the programme committee. Paper presented by J. Mezei)
AMASES 2016 (Catania, Italy. Co-organizer with S. Corrente and B. Cavallo of the special session on "Multiple Criteria Decision Aiding")
EWG-MCDA Euro Working group on Multicriteria Decision Aiding (Vienna, Austria: speaker)

Responsabilita' di studi e ricerche scie.content: Academy of Finland Postdoctoral researcher. Project title: "Consistency of valued preference relations for decision analytics methods". Total external funding: € 254.670. Acceptance rate of projects: around 9%.

Conseguimento di premi e riconoscimenti.content: Two times winner of the Teacher of the Year Award (Spring 2013 and Autumn 2013), Systems Analysis Laboratory, Aalto University

Direzione o partecipazione alle attivit\.content: Visiting student - Department of System Science and Industrial Engineering, Binghamton University, USA. Advisor: distinguished prof. emeritus George J. Klir
Member of "Knowledge Mobilisation", Tekes Research project (40211/08) in collaboration with major Finnish industrial companies, FINLAND. Ref: Prof. Christer Carlsson.
Doctoral student and then postodoctoral researcher at the Institute of Advanced Management Systems Research (http://iamsr.abo.fi/), Turku, FINLAND
Visiting scholar, CITRIS, University of California, Berkeley, USA. Advisor: Dr. Masoud Nikravesh
Member of "Dyscotec", Tekes Research project (40039/11) in collaboration with major Finnish industrial companies, FINLAND. Ref: Prof. Christer Carlsson.
Visiting scholar, KEDRI, Auckland University of Technology, NEW ZEALAND, Advisor: prof. Nikola Kasabov
Postdoctoral Researcher at Systems Analysis Laboratory (http://sal.aalto.fi/en/), Espoo, FINLAND. Ref.: Prof. Raimo Hämäläinen
Visiting researcher, Japan Advanced Institute of Science and Technology, JAPAN, Advisor: prof. Yasuo Sasaki

Formale attribuzione di incarichi di ins.content: LECTURER for the course: Management science and inventory analysis [5 credits, Åbo Akademi University]
LECTURER for the course: Financial planning [5 credits, Åbo Akademi University]
LECTURER for the course: Nonlinear programming [5 credits, Aalto University]

RESPONSIBLE for the courses (independent studies, Aalto University): Multiple Criteria Optimization (3 credits) - Introduction to Convex Optimization with Engineering Applications (5 credits) - Introduction to Linear Dynamical Systems (5 credits)
LECTURER for the course: Aggregation functions in decision making [3 credits, Aalto University]
LECTURER for the course: Fuzzy sets [3 credits, Aalto University]

Responsabilita' scientifica per progetti.content: Academy of Finland Postdoctoral researcher. Project title: "Consistency of valued preference relations for decision analytics methods". Total external funding: € 254.670. Acceptance rate of projects: around 9%.
